name: urlscan
description: Searches the urlscan.io API and returns results from the most recent, relevant scan

options.name: API Key
options.description: A valid urlscan API Key which can be generated on the urlscan dashboard. (Only required for manual new URL submission)

options.name: Allow Manual URL Submission for Scanning
options.description: If there are no search results, this allows you to choose to submit the url for scanning when searching On Demand. (API Key Required)

options.name: View Malicious Indicators Only
options.description: If checked, only indicators flagged as malicious will be returned

options.name: Search Tasked URLs and Domains
options.description: If checked, the integration will search tasked URLs and Domains in addition to the primary domain (defaults to true).

options.name: Ignored Entities
options.description: List of domains and IPs that you never want to send to urlscan

options.name: Ignored Domain Regex
options.description: Domains that match the given regex will not be looked up.

options.name: Ignored IP Regex
options.description: IPs that match the given regex will not be looked up.

options.name: Proxy Screenshots through Polarity Server
options.description: If checked, the Overlay Window will receive the URL's screenshot from the Polarity server rather than directly from the urlscan website. If your screenshot images are not properly displaying try enabling this option as it can resolve issues in some environments with unsupported web proxy configurations on the client.

options.name: Max Concurrent Requests
options.description: Maximum number of concurrent requests.  Integration must be restarted after changing this option. Defaults to 20.

options.name: Minimum Time Between Lookups
options.description: Minimum amount of time in milliseconds between lookups. Integration must be restarted after changing this option. Defaults to 100.
